description.en: EcoG9coin is a blockchain-based platform for On/Off Line game services. We aim at creating a new market economy. To do so, we first would focus on Gamelands in Vietnam and expand the user base by utilizing crypto-wallet. Besides, we plan to expand our service to the global digital asset, network, leisure, sports, and shopping industries as we move on.
